Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful

This package contains a set of useful classes to use in the Swing applications.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DnDManager.DnDInterface
    This interface is a set of callbacks to support drag&drop operations in conjunction with DnDManager class.
    J2ColumnEditor.J2ColumnEditorCallback  
    J2ColumnEditor.J2ColumnEditorFilterCallback  
    JContentMetadataEditor.ClassEnumAssociated  
    JFileContentManipulator.LRUPersistence
    This interface describes persistence fotr LRU list in the content manupulator
    JFileSelectionDialog.FilterCallback
    This interface is analog of JFileSelectionDialog.FilterCallback
    JPaginator.PageSelectCallback  
    JStateString.CancelCallback
    This lambda-oriented interface will be called on pressing 'cancel' button
